document.title: Preference Item

data.title: Destination URI

data.title: Your processes
data.desc: Select a process containing roles you wish to add to allowed or banned roles lists.
data.action:
processes: f.this;
change processes options { return configurableMenuService.getNetsByAuthorAsMapOptions(loggedUser(), org.springframework.context.i18n.LocaleContextHolder.locale) }

data.title: Allowed roles
data.desc: List of roles allowed to view this menu entry.

data.title: Banned roles
data.desc: List of roles not allowed to view this menu entry.

data.title: Select new filter
"New case" button icon identifier
Required title input in case creation?
Banned processes for creation
data.desc: Write down process identifiers separated by comma. Example: mynet1,mynet2

data.title: Show more menu for case item?
Headers mode
data.action:
headersMode: f.case_headers_mode, defaultMode: f.case_headers_default_mode, holder: f.case_headers_options_holder;
updateOptionsBasedOnValue(defaultMode, headersMode, holder)

headersMode: f.case_headers_mode, defaultMode: f.case_headers_default_mode, holder: f.case_headers_options_holder;
updateOptionsBasedOnValue(defaultMode, headersMode, holder)

data.title: Set default headers
Select new filter
data.action:
trans: t.task_view_settings, filterAutocomplete: f.this, filterCase: f.additional_filter_case, updateFilter: f.update_additional_filter, previewTaskRef: f.selected_additional_filter_preview;
updateFilterAutocompleteOptions(filterAutocomplete, previewTaskRef, filterCase, updateFilter, trans, true)

trans: t.task_view_settings, filterAutocomplete: f.this, filterCase: f.additional_filter_case, updateFilter: f.update_additional_filter, previewTaskRef: f.selected_additional_filter_preview;
updateFilterAutocompleteOptions(filterAutocomplete, previewTaskRef, filterCase, updateFilter, trans, true)

filterCase: f.additional_filter_case;
change filterCase value { [] }

data.title: Headers mode
data.action:
headersMode: f.task_headers_mode, defaultMode: f.task_headers_default_mode, holder: f.task_headers_options_holder;
updateOptionsBasedOnValue(defaultMode, headersMode, holder)

headersMode: f.case_headers_mode, defaultMode: f.case_headers_default_mode, holder: f.case_headers_options_holder;

i18n.i18nString: Identifikátor Material ikony. Zoznam ikon s identifikátormi je dostupný online.
Vyberte proces obsahujúci roly ktoré chcete pridať do zoznamu povolených alebo zakázaných rolí.
Identifikátor Material ikony. Zoznam ikon s identifikátormi je dostupný online.
Uveďte identifikátory procesov oddelené čiarkou. Napríklad: mynet1,mynet2
Zoznam povolených rolí, ktoré môžu zobraziť túto položku
Zoznam zakázaných rolí, ktoré nemôžu zobraziť túto položku
Material Ikone ID. Liste den Ikonen mit IDs ist online verfügbar.
Wählen Sie einen Prozess mit Rollen aus, die Sie zu Listen mit zulässigen oder verbotenen Rollen hinzufügen möchten.
Will be shown in the menu
